mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(write_date, '%H') AS hour,COUNT(community_seq) AS count_write FROM csat_community WHERE write_date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{ymd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND write_date < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{ymd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), INTERVAL 1 day) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(write_date, '%H');

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(write_date, '%d') AS day,COUNT(community_seq) AS count_write FROM csat_community WHERE write_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{ym}, '01'), '%Y-%m-%d') AND write_date < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{ym}, '01'), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 month) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(write_date, '%d');

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(write_date, '%m') AS month,COUNT(community_seq) AS count_write FROM csat_community WHERE write_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{year}, '0101'), '%Y-%m-%d') AND write_date < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{year}, '0101'), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 year) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(write_date, '%m');
SELECT cc.community_seq, cs.nickname, cc.content, cc.write_date FROM csat_community cc, csat_student cs WHERE cc.use_yn = 'Y' AND cc.student_seq = cs.student_seq

SELECT cc.community_seq, cs.nickname, cc.content, cc.write_date FROM csat_community cc, csat_student cs WHERE cc.use_yn = 'Y' AND cc.student_seq = cs.student_seq AND cc.student_seq = #{studentSequence}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO csat_community(community_type_seq, community_seq, student_seq, content, write_date, use_yn) VALUES (1, (select IFNULL(max(cc.community_seq),0)+1 as community_seq from csat_community cc), #{studentSequence}, #{content}, NOW(), 'Y');
